comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: American sculptor Janet Scudder (1869-1940): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Janet_Scudder Another version of this photo was uploaded to the Commons by the Smithsonian in 2008: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/smithsonian/3076522139/] I remember because I made this purse from it! [http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02/3589973913/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: A U. S. native, in 1913 she established her permanent residence and sculpture studio in Paris, and was there in 1914, when World War I broke out. She remained in France through the war, and for two decades afterward, until shortly before the Nazi invasion in 1940. She died soon after her return to the U. S.
